name: COPES-VULCAN, DIVISION OF WHITE CONSOLIDATED INDUSTRIES, INC. v. opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 92 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
517 A.2d 539
COPES-VULCAN, DIVISION OF WHITE CONSOLIDATED INDUSTRIES, INC. v.
